channel.title: Software Development on Welcome to dave.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development on Welcome to dave.dev

item.title: My UI Skill Building Journey - Week Two (24-30 May 21)
item.description: Monday 24th May 2021 I decided to install Storybook so I can follow along on my local machine.

item.title: My UI Skill Building Journey - Week One (17-21 May 21)
item.description: Initially I’ll commit 30 minutes per day to this. That should be long enough for new material to stick and short enough so that some new info doesn’t converyorbelt other new info through my brain and out the other side.

item.title: My UI Skill Building Journey - Introduction
item.description: I’m terrible at UI. I can hack together HTML and CSS, smash together components from frameworks, but I do not generally build anything from scratch because it’s too hard.

item.title: Developing Software The Right Way, with Intent and Carefulness
item.description: This blog post / write-up is long overdue. I’m the guy that’s gone from electronics and hardware person, to embedded software, software, networking and now back to software with a keen interest in programmable hardware.
